ast.name: ASP Application Service (Draft)
ast.description: The application layer service collects data from backend and provides them to frontend. It follows the v3 API spec defined in [here](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/15pucEI0MHj9y778EyaAWGh4MBH-I73i1-GS0ir7FhxE/edit#slide=id.g29c3ffcc3_053).

parameters.name: stepType
parameters.description: Type of the  work step, can be designConcepts, completeDesigns or finalFixes

actions.name: Get a collection of steps
actions.description: Get all the work steps for the given project_id and work type

resources.name: A step
resources.description:
The following properties may be PATCHed **one at a time**:

+ rankedSubmissions

+ customerConfirmedRanks

+ customerAcceptedFixes

actions.name: Update a step
actions.description: Update partial information of a work step with PATCH

actions.name: Get a collection of submissions
actions.description: Get all the submissions under the given work step

resources.name: Timeline Events
resources.description: Authroization header has to be provided along with this request to identify the user.

parameters.name: work_id
parameters.description: ID of the work in form of an integer

actions.name: Get the timeline events
actions.description: Get information of the timeline events

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
Url Encoded list of filterable fields

+ id - work Id

+ assetType - Asset Type

+ fileName - File Name

+ category - Category

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Comma separated list of fields to include

+ url - Include the preSignedUrl to download each file

actions.name: Add a new File Metadata Object

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Id of the File Metadata

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Category of the File Metadata

parameters.name: fileId
parameters.description: Id of the File Metadata

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Category of the File Metadata

resources.name: Work item
resources.description: Authroization header has to be provided along with this request to identify the user.

actions.name: Create a new work item
actions.description: Create a new work item with an empty thread attached. The type of work object is specified with the `modelType` field.
